    <p>Confirm that there are no matters which have altered any of the Ethical Considerations set out on the Regulation of Auditor’s Checklist (Ac2), and Provision of Non-Audit Services to Audit Clients (Ac3).  </p>
<p>If matters have arisen, are we able to continue as auditors?</p>
<p><i>The following matters should be considered:</i></p>
<ul>
    <li><i>Any matters brought to the attention of the Audit Engagement Partner regarding the audit firm’s independence from the client.</i></li>

    <li><i>Any new non-audit services being provided requiring the completion of form “Provision of Non-Audit Services to Audit Clients”.</i></li>
    <li><i>Any fraud which brings into consideration the integrity of management.</i></li>
</ul>
